vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Issachar living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.13;
son of: Issachar (H3485);
brother of: Tola (H8439), Puah (H6312) and Jashub (H3437H)
Group of shim.ron (שִׁמְרוֹן "Shimron" H8110B)
§ Shimronites = see Shimron "guardian"
descendants of Shimron
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Simrón; tribu de Isacar
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
伸崙族 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 見 伸崙
伸崙的後裔 (民 26:24)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
伸仑族 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 见 伸仑
伸仑的后裔 (民 26:24)
